function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate collaboration across sectors and disciplines","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close similarities observed between historical guidance and 2007 guidance in pandemic preparedness planning.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Population reflux in labor-intensive cities leading to future outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate engagement of diverse communities in pandemic planning","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate coverage of equity issues in the literature review","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate identification of interventions due to rapid review process.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete integration of lessons from historical pandemics prior to 1900.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective screening criteria leads to the inclusion of irrelevant articles","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of relevant articles based on abstract and title screening","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of relevant articles during data extraction","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changing preferences and expectations about green spaces due to the pandemic","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"New expectations regarding social distancing within green spaces","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Permanent aversion to large public gatherings","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of decreased use of public spaces","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social and class differences in the use of public space may lead to unequal exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 challenges the traditional activities of public spaces, such as shopping and socializing, leading to potential changes in behavior and interactions in public areas.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drop in pedestrian traffic associated with commercial activity due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations on social behavior and informal social interactions in public spaces due to the pandemic","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clusters of people gathering in interior and exterior spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Altered perception of capacity due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance to monitoring and contact-tracing app adoption","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduced attachment to public places due to prolonged absence during lockdown.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in perceptions of public spaces correlated with covid-19 impact, lockdown severity, and economic impact.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased risk of domestic abuse due to lockdowns and stay-at-home orders","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Undocumented immigrants and racialized minorities may avoid public spaces due to increased control and securitization, leading to further marginalization and isolation.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Religious minorities may face discrimination in public spaces due to associations between religion, class, and the spread of disease.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to detect and mitigate disruptive events","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Vague definition of resilience","category":"Conceptual risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overlap with existing concepts","category":"Conceptual risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of consensus on resilience definitions leads to ambiguity in understanding resilience concepts.","category":"Conceptual risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Choosing production over safety","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Qualitative approach leading to potential bias in the study results","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Purposive sampling technique used to select diverse participants may not fully represent the population and lead to biased results.","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and collaboration may lead to confusion and errors in patient care.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective communication and collaboration among healthcare professionals","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor communication and collaboration between nursing and medical management teams","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of communication and collaboration between nurses and physicians in a civil environment","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Undermined workplace collaboration and community interactions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of management principles for crem strategic alignment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive strategic alignment models","category":"Conceptual risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adapting to community measures and guidelines","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Organizations failing to comply with community measures for controlling covid-19 spread","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of misinformation or incomplete information about workplace management practices and covid-19 response due to lack of validation and confirmation at the end of interviews.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of risk management and factors affecting implementation in the workplace","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of face-to-face communication and team working atmosphere","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of effective risk management in workplace operations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate collaboration between different company segments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective response due to lack of previous experience with risk management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uneven compliance with community measures","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on administrative control and personal protection for risk control","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
